ENABLED_DOC: Enable automatic backlight control based on VEML7700 ambient light sensor
MEASUREMENT_INTERVAL_DOC: Time between light sensor readings (0.1 - 10 seconds)
MIN_BACKLIGHT_DOC: Minimum display brightness level (0-255). Display will never go darker than this value.
MAX_BACKLIGHT_DOC: Maximum display brightness level (0-255). Display will never go brighter than this value.
LUX_MULTIPLIER_DOC: Calibration multiplier for VEML7700 sensor (0.01 - 10). Increase for brighter response, decrease for darker response.
SMOOTHING_FACTOR_DOC: Brightness transition smoothness (0.0 - 1.0). Lower = slower/smoother transitions, Higher = faster/more responsive.
CONFIG_SAVED: Configuration saved successfully. Service will reload settings automatically.
